content: row 1 once more three 9 stitch floats will have off sts co 7 pm for beginning of round after been created 4 of these co sts last 3 become the first 3 sts pattern row of the new round row a p1 k1tbl 3 times p1 k4 pick up continue new round k1tbl p1 twice sl 9 bottom float by sliding the right needle down sts with yarn held to front p1 k1tbl 3 behind the top two floats lifting the bottom times p1 k to end float and placing it on the left needle repeat pattern rounds a and b twice then between the first and second stitches k1 round a 3 times so no floats remain dropping the float so it is caught behind the p1 k1tbl around for 8 rounds st just worked k4 p1 k1tbl 3 times p1 k to bobble in twisted rib pattern end see photo tutorial below weave in ends and wet block stretching the row b p1 k1tbl 3 times p1 sl 9 sts with slipped stitch area lengthwise as much as yarn held to the front p1 k1tbl 3 times p1 possible k to end repeat pattern row until mitt measures thanks so much for knitting my pattern 19cm/7 5in ending with row a please visit www emmaknits net for more right mitt thumb all text and images copyright emma galati work pattern row b once 2013 not for resale or reproduction p1 k1tbl 3 times p1 k4 pick up bottom you are free to do whatever you like with float and k1 catching float behind k4 p1 your finished object but please credit me as the designer should you choose to sell it k1tbl twice bobble 7 k to end p1 k1tbl 3 times p1 sl 9 sts with yarn held to front p1 k1tbl twice co 7 using backwards loop method k to end �6
